stress_text:
The "subjective minute" test was developed by Dr. Litvak, a specialist in psychiatry, psychology, and stress management.

Instructions: press the START button, close your eyes, and mentally imagine when 60 seconds have passed. It is IMPORTANT not to count the minute, but to feel the time.

When you feel: a minute has passed, press STOP
less 35: A result of less than 35 seconds (especially obtained repeatedly at different times of the day) is already a full–fledged reason to take care of yourself and think about the help of a specialist.
less 45: Less than 45 seconds - severe anxiety. Here, rather, it is no longer about anxiety, but about fear or acute (fresh) anxiety.
45-54: 45-54 seconds - moderate anxiety. This is the level of alertness, anxiety, confusion. As a rule, at this level you need to start thinking about rest, reboot. Not to let stress consume you.
55-64: 55-64 seconds – mild anxiety, in fact, a normal condition. This is the level of ordinary life anxiety, doubt, and distrust. With this level of anxiety, you are able to quickly influence your condition by banal switching of attention.
65-70: 65-70 seconds: you don't have anxiety right now.
more 70: 70+ seconds then the error is likely due to the desire to get a "good" result, or you are really tired and your reactions lag behind.
with_and_without_sound: 1 bar with sound and 1 bar without sound
enter_lover_email: Enter your loved one's email address. We will send a request to confirm the status of your relationship.
remove_lover_1: When you remove the relationship timer from
work_more_6: Scientists agree that we are productive for no more than 6 hours a day.   Don’t forget rest is no less important for success than work.  Working more than 10 hours a day won't make you more productive. But you risk hating your life and undermining your health.
work_4_6: Well done. Researchers from the UK reported that they managed to find out how historical figures who are now considered classics and geniuses worked. Many of them worked in average for four hours a day but every day.
work_2_4: Perhaps you are a time management guru and know how to prioritize so that you can do everything in time. Excellent result
work_less_2: Vacation or you are the FIRE follower?
sport_more_3: A professional athlete or we recommend that you take care of yourself, 3 hours of exercise every day will not add to your health.
sport_1_2: To do sports about 2 hours few time a week may be the most comfortable and effective gym schedule
sport_less_1: If you do so every day – great strategy to stay fit and healthy. If you do so less then 3 time a week – may  be you need to  devote more time to sports,  of course if you feel you need it
time_killer_less2: Very good. You are in balance of pleasure&brain-rest and work&life pressure. This can become the good “pill” to release stress.
time_killer_more2: Be careful - timekillers are very dangerous and sneaky. You will not notice how you will collect snowballs of unfinished business and it will torment you. Getting out of the situation will be much more taft than entering.
your_data_safe: Your personal data are guaranteed to be safe and will not be handed over to third parties
order_text:
We are probably the world's best wristwatch couturiers because, like you, we understand your desires. We are the first in the history of the world to dare to offer a truly unique and luxurious solution for those who want to create something very personal, but at the same time understandable and timeless. MAISON DE COUTURE. 

BAKKOURA is the only atelier in the world that will translate you into a brand. Each person's story is unique, it cannot be repeated or falsified, we help you to write your own legend, because this brand is you yourself.
Your_order_sent: Your order has been sent. We will contact you shortly to clarify the details.
Consultation_text: BAKKOURA is the only atelier in the world that will translate you into a brand. Each person's story is unique, it cannot be repeated or falsified, we help you to write your own legend, because this brand is you yourself.

send_idea_desc: If you have an idea, we can bring it to life
Constructor_desc: You can create a watch using the constructor
wallpaper_desc: An updated list of wallpapers of brand watches
Idea_text: Your preferences are very important to us. We strive to satisfy your most sophisticated tastes. Just imagine, you have the opportunity to realize your idea in the most exquisite form!
Select who you would like to contact: Select who you would like to contact
Contact_text: Send Your letter now and We will contact you shortly to clarify the details.
AssestmentWatch_bottom_text: But that's not all. To learn how to embody beautiful and strong souls in watches, we have spent years studying more than just watchmaking. Psychology, art history, biographies of great people, fine arts, philosophy - all this knowledge has taught us how to feel people and create brands.
AssestmentWatch_top_text: The magic begins when you're ready.Within 15 days, we will review your application and decide if a Bakkoura expert is ready to dedicate time to develop your brand.The concept of a work of art made with soul can only be realized for those who have values, goals and methods that match ours.
AssestmentWatch_top_title_text: Send us an application or give us a call

pomodoro_slider: The tasks you have created will be displayed at the bottom of the screen. Each of them displays the number of pomodoro cycles, name and description. To start the task timer, select it from the list. To change or delete a task, click on the three dots on the right.
metronom_slider_1: At the bottom of the screen, you can select the number of clock cycles and specify whether to skip it every other time
metronom_slider_2: You can change the speed per second at the top of the screen using the plus and minus buttons
time_together_slider_1: The created etaps will be displayed in the list below, where you can change them by clicking on the 3 dots on the right, synchronize the clock with another user by clicking on the yellow sync button, or select the necessary stage to show information about it
time_together_slider_2: At the top of the screen, you can use the toggle switch to change the hour format of the clock - 24h or 30h
timer_slider_1: At the top of the screen, using the toggle switch, you can change the hour format of the clock - 24h or 30h and change the direction of the timer - backward or forward
timer_slider_2: The yellow button below lets you set the type of activity: work or leisure
world_time_slider: At the top of the screen, using the toggle switch, you can change the hour format of the clock - 24h or 30h
stopwatch_slider_1: At the top of the screen, using the toggle switch, you can change the hour format of the clock - 24h or 30h and switch to another stopwatch display by clicking on an empty circle
bakkoura_watch_slider_1: At the top of the screen, using the toggle switch, you can change the hour format of the clock - 24h or 30h
This feature is only supported on Androi: This feature is only supported on Android.
To update your password, you need to log: To update your password, you need to log in again
messenger_slider_1: To edit a message, delete it, or set a reaction, hold down the desired message and select the desired action
alarm_slider_1: At the top of the screen, you can use the toggle switch to change the alarm clock format - 24h or 30h
alarm_slider_2: To delete the alarm clock swipe it to the left to the end
calendar_slider_1: To delete a event, simply swipe it to the left to the end
calendar_slider_2: By clicking on the toggle switch on the left, you can change the calendar view - a list or scrollable days
To change the language correctly, please: To change the language correctly, please re-enter the application
project_timer_slider_1: To delete a project, simply swipe it to the left to the end
project_timer_slider_2: By going to the ‘Calculate’ page, you can select the project whose income and time spent you want to view in the drop-down list at the top
to_do_timer_slider: By clicking on the ‘History’ page you can see and filter projects by time spent over a certain period by selecting the appropriate filter from above
